sentences.en: He felt her familiar briskness, and he knew that it was all over.
sentences.cn: 他感觉到了她一贯的爽快作风，他明白一切都结束了。

sentences.en: The briskness with which he went through the agenda reflected his strategy.
sentences.cn: 他谈议程时那种匆匆忙忙的样子表明他在耍手腕.

sentences.en: They are stimulating and refreshing because with commonsense briskness they brush away illusions and secondhand opinions.
sentences.cn: 它们有启发性、使人耳目一新是因为它们用简明的常识洗刷去了幻觉和旧的观点.

sentences.en: With determined briskness, Amy stood up and put their cups back on the tray.
sentences.cn: 埃米干脆利落地站起身来，把他们的杯子放回到盘子里。

words.tran_cn: 敏锐的，活泼的，轻快的；凛冽的
